headline: Rangers Women top of SWPL after Hearts defeat at Glasgow City
summary: Ten-player Glasgow City beat Hearts, allowing nine-goal Rangers to go top of the ScottishPower Women’s Premier League. Aberdeen 2-0 Montrose Celtic 5-1 Motherwell Glasgow City 2-1 Hearts Hibernian 6-0 Dundee United Rangers 9-0 Queen’s Park […]

headline: Chelsea Women sign striker Louna Ribadeira on a four-year deal
summary: Chelsea have signed French striker Louna Ribadeira on a four-year deal but she will return to Paris FC on loan for the 2024/25 season. She made 24 appearances and scored eight goals for Paris FC […]

headline: Sheffield United Women sign Jamaican international Satara Murray
summary: Sheffield United have confirmed the signing of experienced Jamaica international defender Satara Murray from Bristol City. The 31-year-old has played in the Barclays Women’s Super League, as well as the NWSL in the USA. Murray […]

headline: PFA Awards won by Khadija Shaw and Grace Clinton
summary: Khadija Shaw has been named the 2023/24 Professional Footballers’ Association Women’s Players’ Player of the Year, while Grace Clinton won the Young Player honour. Shaw scored 21 goals in 18 league appearances for Manchester City […]

headline: Rytting Kaneryd brace helps Chelsea Women beat Gotham FC
summary: All the goals came in the first 31 minutes as Chelsea won their pre-season friendly at Gotham FC 3-1 on Monday night. Johanna Rytting Kaneryd took just seven minutes of Sonia Bompastor’s first game in […]

headline: Barclays WSL & Championship Summer 2024 Transfer Watch
summary: Keep track of all the 2024 summer transfer window moves involving Barclays WSL and Women’s Championship players with our regularly updated list. Although the WSL transfer window remains open from 24 June through to 13 […]

headline: West Ham United Women re-sign Shelina Zadorsky on permanent deal
summary: West Ham United have signed Canadian international centurion Shelina Zadorsky following the expiration of her contract at Tottenham Hotspur. She made ten appearances on loan to the Hammers last season, playing 66 times for Spurs […]

headline: Everton and Liverpool grouped together in Women’s League Cup
summary: The Merseyside rivals are joined in their Women’s League Cup group by Manchester United and Newcastle United. The draw was made live on talkSPORT2’s Social Show and carried out by former England international Lianne Sanderson. […]

headline: Sheffield United Women sign Maria Farrugia
summary: Sheffield United have signed Malta international attacking midfielder Maria Farrugia following her departure from Lewes. The Blades fought off competition from clubs both domestically and overseas to secure the 23-year-old, who has previously enjoyed spells […]

headline: Man City Women sign Naomi Layzell on four-year deal
summary: Manchester City have signed England youth international defender Naomi Layzell from Bristol City on a four-year contract. The 20-year-old was an integral part of Bristol City’s promotion to the WSL in 2022-23 season, playing 20 […]
